Grammar:    DataElement 6.0
Namespace:  shr.core
CodeSystem: MTH = http://uts.nlm.nih.gov/metathesaurus

Element:		Coding
Value:			code
Property:		Vocabulary 0..1
Property:   DisplayText 0..1

Element:		CodeableConcept
Property:   Coding  0..*
Property: DisplayText 1..1

Element:		Vocabulary
Value:			uri

Element:		DisplayText
Value:			string

Element:		Quantity
Description:	"A quantity with Units."
Value:			decimal
Property:   Units 0..1

Element:		Units
Value:			Coding from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/ucum-units

Element:		Version
Value:			id
